item.title: cs-retrospect
item.description: 了解一件事，首先： why what how design principle SoC: separation of concerns :: mudularity abstract indirection > All problems in computer science can be solved by another level of indirection, except for the problem of too many layers of indirection. character cache cache, 内存页 DNS缓存， concurrent
